text: akasannalum bhumiyum avan yathart'thyapurvvam srsticcirikkunnu. ratriye kkeant avan pakalinmel currippeatiyunnu. pakalinekkeant avan ratrimelum currippeatiyunnu. suryaneyum candraneyum avan niyantranavidheyamakkukayum ceytirikkunnu. ellam niscitamaya paridhivare sancarikkunnu. ariyuka: avanatre pratapiyum ere pearukkunnavanum
